articles.title: 4 Asiatic lions at Night Safari test positive for Covid-19 after exposure to infected staff - The Straits Times
articles.description: Testing is ongoing for one African lion at Singapore Zoo that had shown signs of sickness.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Four lions at the Night Safari have tested positive for Covid-19, said the Animal & Veterinary Service (AVS) on Tuesday (Nov 9).

articles.title: New regional green bond index rules to take effect in March 2022 - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: MEMBERS of the Executives’ Meeting of East Asia-Pacific Central Banks (EMEAP) will adopt new rules on green investments through the Asian Bond Fund (ABF) by March 2022 to boost sustainable investments in the region.
articles.content:
NEW RULES on green bond investments will take effect in March next year. BW FILE PHOTO
